commands.command: SELECT S.[ID] , U.Name AS [ProjectManager] , S.[AuditStatus] , S.[PayStatus] , S.[CustomName] , S.[TimeFrom] AS DTimeFrom , D.[Name] AS Base , S.[TotalPrice] , S.[CostPrice] , S.[ReceivedMoney] , S.[RemainingMoney] FROM [dbo].[Sheet] AS S LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] AS U ON S.ProjectManager = U.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.[Dictionary] AS D ON S.Base=D.ID WHERE S.[Deleted]=0

SELECT TOP 1 [ID] ,[CustomName] ,[Contacts] ,[Phone] ,[QQ] ,[WeiXin] ,[Address] ,[TimeFrom] AS DTimeFrom ,[TimeTo] AS DTimeTo ,[Base] ,[People] ,[Source] ,[TotalPrice] ,[UnitPrice] ,[CostPrice] ,[Remark] FROM [dbo].[Sheet] WHERE [ID]=@ID
